textContent: If someone says "I have many foreign freinds online", you might envy him or her. However, today, when making friends online has become easy and popular, the number of friends doesn't matter.
title: Are "foreign friends" necessary?
textContentHtml: If someone says "I have many foreign freinds online", you might envy him or her. However, today, when making friends online has become easy and popular, the number of friends doesn't matter.
